Constructor Detail

Rectangle

public Rectangle()

Rectangle

public Rectangle(float left,
                 float bottom,
                 float right,
                 float top)
Creates a new rectangle. Note: no range checking is performed, so the caller must ensure that left <= right and top >= bottom.

Parameters:
left - The X coordinate of the left side of the rectangle
top - The Y coordinate of the top of the rectangle
right - The X coordinate of the right side of the rectangle
bottom - The Y coordinate of the bottom of the rectangle

isCollision

public static boolean isCollision(Rectangle rect1,
                                  Rectangle rect2)
Checks if there is a collision between two rectangles. have to check this before you do more precise tests like direction tests

Parameters:
rect1 -
rect2 -
Returns:
true if there is a collision.
